title: My friend crashes during champion select every 3-4 games.
body:
I figured it was a memory issue because it was always after a few games, but today he crashed on the first game. 

I was hoping to get him into alpha to test this but on PBE beta is up anyway, so its just a matter of time before he gets his own access. Its still annoying though, so maybe, just maybe we can test this early for him?

replies.body: Is he using any third party programs?  Apps like play.tv and replays have been known to crash the client during champion select.  If that doesn't help, have him send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be happy to help him individually!
This happens to everyone every day. Watch any streamer or play yourself.
